Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- In the past 24 hours in just the Pokrovsk directi...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have captured two large fortifications and have reached the outskirts of Novozhelannoe, Pokrovsk direction – both sides have confirmed the advance. 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- In the past 24 hours in just the Pokrovsk direction Russian forces have captured Mezhovoe, Skuchnoe, Novozhelannoe, Zavitnoe and Krutyi-Yar.Russian troops captured the remaining northern half of Zhuravka too and advanced further north reaching the center of Krasniy-Yar.Russian forces also captured the vital fortification south of Nikolaivka, meaning the Ukrainian supply route, E50 highway, to Novogrodovka has been cut.Ukrainian forces withdrew from the east of Volcha river, as they risked being completely cut off after the fall of Mezhovoe.
